info.name: TheArtistUnion // dark
info.description:
[ Made a dark theme for the popular music/soundcloud promotion site, TheArtistUnion. A lot of the elements were the same so I decided to go ahead and darken them all. I hope everyone finds this useful for when uploading/listening at night. :) ]

Any of the elements changed and want me to update them or have a question on this theme? Contact me!
info.additionalInfo:
[v1.5] 3/5/17:
- Updated the progress bar background color when uploading music.
------------------------------------
[v1.1] 1/20/17:
- Updated a few areas which were white (ex: the player, background of the track edit page, etc)
------------------------------------
[v1.0] 11/21/2016:
- Initial release
